.. _`cs-web-components-base-components.HelpReference.HelpReference`:

=============
HelpReference
=============

.. contents:: Local Navigation
   :local:
   :depth: 2

Description
===========



Renders a help button. Clicking the button will open the help page defined by the
given helpId.

React Properties
----------------

+------------------+--------------+--------------+-------------------------------------------+
| Property         | Type         | Default      | Use                                       |
+==================+==============+==============+===========================================+
| helpId           | string       | \-           | The Help-ID of the help page              |
+------------------+--------------+--------------+-------------------------------------------+
| helpUrl          | string       | \-           | The URL of the help page if no id is      |
|                  |              |              | provided                                  |
+------------------+--------------+--------------+-------------------------------------------+
